name: Fastgen
headline: Webflow for the Backend
description: Fastgen is a low-code API and workflow builder with an integrated Postgres DB. Our drag-and-drop platform allows you to rapidly develop custom APIs and workflows with ease. Our integrated Postgres DB makes it even easier to create, read, update, and delete data in your applications.

founders.name: Mike Mahlkow, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at Fastgen (W23). Previously CEO at Blair (S19) where we raised +100M to offer income-based financing options to students.  Before that learned how great teams operate at Stripe and Uber.

founders.name: David Nordhausen, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder at Fastgen (W23). Previously built Blair (S19). Reach out if you're interested in using us david@fastgen.com

founders.name: Constantin Schreiber, Founder
founders.description: Dropped out of college to build Blair (YC S19) where we raised a +100M to build income-based financing solutions for students in the US. At Blair, I led the engineering team to build audit-proof software that moved millions of dollars in student funds on a weekly basis. Two fun facts about me: I built autonomous drones for Porsche and was mining crypto to pay for college (and other things).

Backed by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a4a3786c31f20fc0124c84_Group%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a4a38314e99c15bddb8ec7_622209110f4e92615611e78c_Rainfall-logo%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63ebfacb472f8fb1d9e471d9_623640ece7a5d67dd1cdc030_Mischief-Logotype-White.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a4a388d004d013677a0c75_468%20Capital.png)
## Create APIs in lightning speed
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6ab289f0d6a0981e55b33_v6-icon.svg)
Create
Create REST endoints, set up auth & validation rules.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a832ef2941070b72aa_group_5230.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6aeb2b742962b6ddbf08a_v6-icon%20\(1\).svg)
Build
Connect APIs, third party tools, DB queries and responses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a89b82ee52cab3d601_group_5231.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6af3f3232de5d73983681_v6-icon%20\(2\).svg)
Deploy
Deploy with a click of a button. No devops. We host for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a82113023efc108f7b_group_5232.webp)
## Debug your APIs, cron jobs & workflows
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6b1dd19c5f8293ee979db_icon%20\(7\).svg)
Test
Send test requests with unique headers, auth and parameters.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a9e8c0e31290bdab35_group_5242.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6b268520d5c7f680ed5f7_v6-icon%20\(3\).svg)
Understand
Get details for each action and understand what’s happening.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a96e5615ed84cbea28_group_5228.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6b2845de8b2875f74e43b_v6-icon%20\(4\).svg)
Fix
Fix whatever is broken in your routes instantly in the UI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a8ce9a28536b563a16_group_5233.webp)
## Building Dreams, One Click at a Time
### Variables
Access data with ease through a pre-defined data structure. Index variables to access specific elements within a given list.Set fallback values to manage defaults.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656dbc024c6f39699cb3316d_blair-building-dreams-im1-v2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f579de230b4a6fb9d0_blair-building-dreams-im2.svg)
### Inject Code where you need it
Write, test, and implement your own custom logic directly in a code editor. We support Node.js and Python and let you integrate external libraries with a built-in package manager.
### Environment Variables
Manage and store your secrets, configuration settings or any sensitive information. Directly access those variables in your APIs and workflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f50ed44885e4f16358_blair-building-dreams-im3.svg)
## Do anything & everything with your data
### Conditions
Conditional flow controls let you specify what to execute depending on what data is processed.Multi level logic trees, loops and other conditions come with pre-written operators.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656db4361b3aa22028aadd38_do-anything-im1-v2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f6b2d08cf0940074d3_do-anything-im2.svg)
### AI SQL Copilot
Let our copilot speed you up in writing SQL statements.Add queries directly to your flows.
### Functions
Select from 50+ functions to manipulate data exactly how you want it to.Operators let you define variables directly in the UI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f68e0e78f6925766ff_do-anything-im3.svg)
## Autosync all your builds in Config files
Everything you build on the platform automatically creates a YAML Config file.Use files for versioning & faster deployment of repetitve flows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bebc2b2e264741f2f409de_Group%205016%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bebba43e8b7aa005b2e60f_Ellipse%20628.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bebb93c6313b4c754be32a_Group%205086%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/6513276941963ee3f0fd9ad6_Group%205074.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bee1365f811020cb90d8b0_Group%205095%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/651327b0412c58024467071b_Group%205075.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bee0c07e2300de92d6c135_Group%205098.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/651326c99ea969d44f83f724_fastgennew-logo-shadow.webp)
## Build workflows withyour favorite tools
Choose from one of our native integrations or customize yourworkflow with any HTTP endpoint.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/651327bf9ea969d44f851198_Group%205076.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bedf987e2300d8a5d6b21a_Group%205095.png)

## Loved by builders around the world
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a5bbaf6df3551a03e91102_Ellipse%202%20\(2\).png)
Evan Farrel
@evfrl
Favorite tool of the week: Fastgen. It is still in Beta but it already saved me so much time!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a5bbca760c9d46b5c86ba8_Ellipse%202%20\(3\).png)
Matthias Klenk
@mathiasklenk
Shoutout to Fastgen. Love how quickly I can build new backends without thinking about DevOps at all
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a5bac7a7089cda4598608e_Ellipse%202.png)
Dan Meier
@danmeier20
We started building with Fastgen. It’s a crazy to see how much faster we are able to ship at Unlock. Looking forward to the next round of updates, especially the direct hosting feature
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63ee92cce39a2e4241ca173a_Ellipse%20Max%20Greenwald.png)
Max Greenwald
@MaxPGreenwald
I am a big fan of the Fastgen team. They are lighting fast with their replies to any question
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/640f75511e6d97808fae562c_523wBKGt_400x400.jpeg)
Max Elster
@maxelster
Just received early access to Fastgen. Can’t wait to see what this platform is capable of
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63efabaf61bbf2fefe1728cb_Ellipse%202.png)
Andrej Safundzic
@AndrejSafundzic
Fastgen is my new favorite way to build automations at Lumos. It is fast and we do not need to think about hosting at all. Hope they add more integrations soon
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63ee8c08b6f69a845af3b866_fastgen_logo_white_vector.svg)](https://fastgen.com/<#top-of-page>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/648a3e29a5c6b5c9b398ab1b_twitter.png)](https://fastgen.com/<https:/twitter.com/FastgenHQ>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/648a3e1da5c6b5c9b3989d82_linkedin.png)](https://fastgen.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/fastgenhq>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/648a3e2938775d5c03b44c6b_youtube.png)](https://fastgen.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/@FastgenHQ>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/648a3e29ba92fc87d1be7b66_slack.png)](https://fastgen.com/<https:/join.slack.com/t/fastgencommunity/shared_invite/zt-1wcz3tudd-NjeacPvLhfPzDEbziDshiw>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a4a38314e99c15bddb8ec7_622209110f4e92615611e78c_Rainfall-logo%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63ebfacb472f8fb1d9e471d9_623640ece7a5d67dd1cdc030_Mischief-Logotype-White.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63a4a388d004d013677a0c75_468%20Capital.png)
## Create APIs in lightning speed
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6ab289f0d6a0981e55b33_v6-icon.svg)
Create
Create REST endoints, set up auth & validation rules.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a832ef2941070b72aa_group_5230.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6aeb2b742962b6ddbf08a_v6-icon%20\(1\).svg)
Build
Connect APIs, third party tools, DB queries and responses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a89b82ee52cab3d601_group_5231.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6af3f3232de5d73983681_v6-icon%20\(2\).svg)
Deploy
Deploy with a click of a button. No devops. We host for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a82113023efc108f7b_group_5232.webp)
## Debug your APIs, cron jobs & workflows
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6b1dd19c5f8293ee979db_icon%20\(7\).svg)
Test
Send test requests with unique headers, auth and parameters.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a9e8c0e31290bdab35_group_5242.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6b268520d5c7f680ed5f7_v6-icon%20\(3\).svg)
Understand
Get details for each action and understand what’s happening.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a96e5615ed84cbea28_group_5228.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/64b6b2845de8b2875f74e43b_v6-icon%20\(4\).svg)
Fix
Fix whatever is broken in your routes instantly in the UI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/653161a8ce9a28536b563a16_group_5233.webp)
## Building Dreams, One Click at a Time
### Variables
Access data with ease through a pre-defined data structure. Index variables to access specific elements within a given list.Set fallback values to manage defaults.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656dbc024c6f39699cb3316d_blair-building-dreams-im1-v2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f579de230b4a6fb9d0_blair-building-dreams-im2.svg)
### Inject Code where you need it
Write, test, and implement your own custom logic directly in a code editor. We support Node.js and Python and let you integrate external libraries with a built-in package manager.
### Environment Variables
Manage and store your secrets, configuration settings or any sensitive information. Directly access those variables in your APIs and workflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f50ed44885e4f16358_blair-building-dreams-im3.svg)
## Do anything & everything with your data
### Conditions
Conditional flow controls let you specify what to execute depending on what data is processed.Multi level logic trees, loops and other conditions come with pre-written operators.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656db4361b3aa22028aadd38_do-anything-im1-v2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f6b2d08cf0940074d3_do-anything-im2.svg)
### AI SQL Copilot
Let our copilot speed you up in writing SQL statements.Add queries directly to your flows.
### Functions
Select from 50+ functions to manipulate data exactly how you want it to.Operators let you define variables directly in the UI.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/656da7f68e0e78f6925766ff_do-anything-im3.svg)
## Autosync all your builds in Config files
Everything you build on the platform automatically creates a YAML Config file.Use files for versioning & faster deployment of repetitve flows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bebc2b2e264741f2f409de_Group%205016%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bebba43e8b7aa005b2e60f_Ellipse%20628.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/63bebb93c6313b4c754be32a_Group%205086%20\(1\).svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63a478b78ec7275316525948/651326c99ea969d44f83f724_fastgennew-logo-shadow.webp)
## Build workflows withyour favorite tools
Choose from one of our native integrations or customize yourworkflow with any HTTP endpoint.

generated_description:
### Fastgen: The Webflow for Backends

Founded in 2023 and freshly hatched from Y Combinator’s W23 batch, Fastgen is revolutionizing backend development. Think of it as "Webflow for the Backend"—a low-code platform that makes creating APIs and workflows as easy as dragging and dropping. At its heart lies an integrated Postgres database that simplifies managing data—whether you're creating, reading, updating, or deleting.

### What Makes Fastgen Special?

Fastgen allows developers to rapidly build custom APIs and automate workflows without diving deep into complex code. It’s built for speed and efficiency, empowering teams to ship products faster than ever. With features that include:

- **API Creation:** Spin up REST endpoints with ease.
- **Debugging:** Integrated tools for real-time feedback on your API actions.
- **Cron Jobs:** Automate repetitive tasks without fuss.
- **Integrated Database:** Seamlessly manage data with a built-in Postgres DB.

The platform also supports custom code injections in Node.js and Python, allowing more technical users the flexibility they crave.

### The Team Behind the Magic

Located in New York, Fastgen boasts a lean team of seven passionate individuals, including founders Francesco Wiedemann and Trevor Blackwell. They have Gustaf Alstromer as their group partner, providing invaluable support and guidance as the company establishes itself in the developer tool landscape.

### Why Developers Are Taking Notice

Fastgen has been gaining traction, already nominated for a Product Hunt Golden Kitty Award. Users rave about the platform’s speed, its user-friendly interface, and how it alleviates the heavy lifting usually associated with backend development. The product is still in beta, but feedback suggests it has the potential to become a go-to solution for developers looking to streamline their workflow.

### Ready to Join?

Fastgen is all set to change how developers approach backend tasks. If you want to see the magic for yourself, check out their website at [Fastgen.com](https://fastgen.com). With Fastgen, building scalable backend systems feels like child’s play—because everyone deserves to be a builder, and Fastgen is here to make that happen.
